PerfectNetExp.abs: rootapex 根尖, rootbound 盆缚, rootapex 根端

means.word_mean: 1. of a potted plant; grown too large for its container resulting in matting or tangling of the roots
2. having the roots matted or densely tangled;

sentences.sentence: "shaggy untended lawns of old trees and rootbound scented flowers and shrubs"- William Faulkner
